name: com.pretia.sdk
description: Pretia SDK is a part of the Pretia AR Cloud platform to help create shared AR experiences easily.

samples.description: This is a sample project for showing how to create an AR application with the map-based relocalization feature.
This is a sample project for showing how to create an AR application with the image-based relocalization feature.
This is a sample project for showing how to create an AR application with the map-based relocalization + multiplayer feature.
